questions.question: She enjoys …………………
questions.description: Enjoy is followed by a gerund.

questions.question: I am not used to ………………… late.
questions.description: When to is a preposition, it is followed by an ing form.

questions.question: Do you mind my ………………….. here?
questions.description: Ing forms are used after do you mind and would you mind?

questions.question: He is not used to …………………. hard.
I still remember ………………….. butterflies when I was young.
questions.description: Remember is followed by an ing form when the reference is to the past.

questions.question: Little girls enjoy ……………………. with dolls.
questions.description: Enjoy is followed by an ing form.

questions.question: Would you mind ………………….. a little?
questions.description: Ing forms are used after do you mind and would you mind.

questions.question: It is time he …………………..
questions.description: A past tense is used after it is time with a present meaning.

questions.question: It is not easy …………………. over the wall.
I wish I …………………. taller.
questions.description: The past tense is used with a present meaning after I wish. Were is preferred to was in this structure.
